Reviews.Title: Capable little camera
Reviews.Author: Samuel McConnell
Reviews.Content: As a rule, I generally buy and use cameras with a little bit more functionality, like the Nikon P7000 or D3100. However, the DSC-W610, the lowest-end of Sony's current crop of digital cameras, certainly fits the bill for a cheap, pocketable camera that will get the job done, as long as you don't expect too much from it.The camera comes with a battery, a charger, a USB cable, and a wrist strap. The USB cable is not your standard Mini-USB or Micro-USB cable, so if you don't plan on using an SD card reader, make sure not to lose that cable! Speaking of SD cards, this camera doesn't come with one, so make sure you pick one up. (The camera works with SD, SD-HC, and SD-XC cards as well as Memory Stick Pro Duo cards, so pretty much anything you throw at it will do.) Although the camera looks like it has a brushed aluminum front, this affect is applied with a textured sticker, and in fact the whole camera is rather thin plastic. It doesn't feel incredibly fragile, but also doesn't give me much hope that it would survive a moderate fall.The image quality is better than most if not all cell phone cameras, just as you'd expect from a standalone point and shoot. The sensor is moderately sensitive, shooting okay if noisy shots in low-light scenerios. The flash does its job, covering all of the image area (except just the corners when the lens is at its widest). However, don't expect pro-quality photos here, detail resolution when zoomed in all the way is poor, looking muddy and indistinct.The most unique option on this camera, and the reason we ended up choosing this camera, is Sony's sweep panorama mode. Click the shutter release, then slowly pan the camera right. The camera will make sure you held the camera straight enough (using an internal accelerometer, I'm sure) and automatically stitch the pictures together. It produces surprisingly good panoramas with very little work.The biggest differentiator between this camera and its slightly more expensive brother, the Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W620, is the movie mode. The 610 shoots at a paltry 640x480, while the 620 (and higher models) shoot at 720p HD. Keep this in mind when opting to save a few bucks.All in all, this camera is great for people who just want a cheap camera to keep in their pocket and not fuss about too many settings. If you demand excellent image quality, high-res video, or toughness in your camera, then you may want to pass on this one.

Reviews.Title: Amazing for an amateur
Reviews.Author: cwm "cwm41"
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera just after graduating high school. I had a Sony Camera before this, and used it until it didn't work anymore. I was very excited when I took it with me to China, and it took amazing photos. Sadly, I lost it soon after arriving, and had to use friends cameras most of the time I was there. Compared to five different cameras, this one was easily the best. Many of the others took extremely blurry photos, didn't have panorama mode, and all of them went through their batteries fairly quickly. This camera took relatively few blurry photos, and for the first few days in a foreign country, taking hundreds of photos, I didn't need to charge it for three or four days. I also love the colors, the blue is gorgeous and it was helpful for telling it apart from my old camera, or my mom's camera at a glance. It is also quite small and light, smaller than any camera I've had before.After losing my camera was heartbroken. The day after I got back from China, I ordered a new one. I can't wait to get it and keep taking photos.Obviously, this is not a professional camera, but for a girl who loves taking photos, it is absolutely perfect.

Reviews.Title: Love My Sony Cyber Shot , So Far So Good ,,
Reviews.Author: of california
Reviews.Content: I was a little apprehensive about buying a Camera which is very new on the market ,I mean this is a 2012 model ,and the reviews are only a few for the same reason the camera is very new to the market ,but now that I have it here at home I just received today and took some very beautiful pictures very very surprised by the quality of photos ,before the Sony Cyber shot I had a Panasonic lumix ,very good camera but I give it to my nieces after three years of use , I have to say that the pictures of this Sony cyber the color the quality is superior , but the panasonic was only 12-MPs ,and the Sony is 14-MPs which undoubtedly is the reason it produces more beautiful photos ,,and is very very easy to use ,to set the day and time is super easy ,,I know it's a bit early to say just how good the camera is because just received the camera but it left me impressed so far ...

Reviews.Title: Awesome Camera
Reviews.Author: Ame
Reviews.Content: This is a awesome camera, I was worried about spending so much for a camera online but it turned out to be a great deal. The pictures are very high quality.

Reviews.Title: So Easy, Even I Can Do It!
Reviews.Author: Elly Sparks
Reviews.Content: I had a digital camera prior to this that was similar but cost more. The menu was so confusing and my pictures were always blurry. I'm sure it was due to operator error - but like I said, the menu was so confusing, so many things to scroll through and it had so many other features that changing scene/shots was like searching through a maze, every single time!This camera is so easy to navigate. And though there are several different modes - I find that 'easy' mode is just that...easy! It seems to always pick the best mode to fit the lighting and I rarely take a bad picture. Even in low lighting, pictures come out great. The battery life seems to last forever. I use a Sony type N and since I've had it, I've only had to recharge it once! It's slim, light, fits easily in my back pocket/small purse. Getting the battery out is not a problem and the battery/card compartment seems durable (other cameras have flimsy latches that break easy I've found). The viewing screen is large and though I don't usually take panoramic shots, it does work nicely. Simple, easy to navigate menu, great pictures, even in low lighting, and the video recorder also works well and it is easy to switch from camera to video. I posted two photos in the customer image section. Make sure you check out the omelet picture. Click on to see it full size. The colors just pop and it is so incredibly clear and crisp. It even has a "food" setting for morons like me that embarrass my family and friends by taking pictures of my food! I Love this camera!!!

Reviews.Title: LOVE IT!!
Reviews.Author: Kerenclar
Reviews.Content: I love my new camara, the quality of the pictures is very good!! It comes with the charger and everything very care and well packaged!! Great camara and the color is super cute : pink. Very nice camara for a very nice price!! I will use it sooo much for sure!!! I HIGHLY RECOMMEND IT !! GOOD QUALITY PICS!!!

Reviews.Title: lens got stuck in the camera after 2 months
Reviews.Author: christine
Reviews.Content: My lens got stuck in the camera after 2 months of owning it and Sony tried to charge me 150 euro to have it fixed, which was the same price as the camera, so I told them to keep it.I would not recommend this camera as I dont think they are in any way durable enough. Its a flimsy camera and Sony were a disgrace to deal with

Reviews.Title: Just what I was looking for
Reviews.Author: jcaboose
Reviews.Content: This was a present for my daughter's 10th birthday. She wanted a "real" camera and her favorite color is pink, so this fit the bill. The camera is actually quite good in natural light and not bad indoors with a flash, but it's hardly what you'd call fast, nor does it work too well in low light and can't handle any kind of movement without blurring significantly. Then again, it was well under $100, so one shouldn't expect it to behave like an SLR. It's a handy little pocket camera for snapshots, and a great device for my daughter to learn with. This is my second Sony camera, and both have been sort of mixed performers - great in natural light, less so in anything else, and this one particularly seems to give things more of a yellowish tint most of the time. For my own use with pocket cameras, I've tried models from Sony, Panasonic, Nikon and Kodak, and Canon remains the best overall in image quality, which to me is far and away the most important feature.

Reviews.Title: Sony DSCW610 is totally awesome
Reviews.Author: Cool Cam
Reviews.Content: The product is really cool..Panorama click is really great..The weight and size of the cam is very low....Easy to carry...

Reviews.Title: litle camera but goog quality photo
Reviews.Author: jesus baduil
Reviews.Content: I purchase this camera especially for holiday times this is a great instrument for recorded the moments that you spent with your familiy or friend the price of the camera was excellent for under 100 $ i am happy with this the camera include the usb cable, baterry charge, manual and wrist strap no include carry case and memory for storage your photo and video

Reviews.Title: 14.1 MP Pink Sony Camera
Reviews.Author: 68camarogirl
Reviews.Content: The camera arrived as specified and packed well. Did no like the idea of need to purchase SD disk for camera. I thought that would have been included in purchase price. Nice to have the battery and charger included in purchase. This purchase was for my Mother-in-Law's 69th Birthday 11/6/12 and she needed an upgrade. For her this purchase was great and highly recommend product.

Reviews.Title: great pictures!
Reviews.Author: DMichelleLeon
Reviews.Content: First of all I love the color of the camera. The pictures are awesome and the battery (rechargable battery with charger included)life is pretty long too. I love that I no longer have to purchase batteries.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera!
Reviews.Author: Mandy "MandyRN"
Reviews.Content: Very small and fits easily in my purse this little camera takes great pics!  The menu is easy to configure, one button flash on/off, just nice and simple.  The pictures come out great.  This is a small camera and may be awkward for someone with big hands but it's perfect for me.  I bought the small case and the charger and camera both fit inside nicely :)

Reviews.Title: Great Color but Okay Quality
Reviews.Author: Cherry
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a replacement for another Sony digital camera that I lost. Compared to my original camera, this wasn't as great. My shots often come out slightly blurry, especially in flash mode. Pictures taken in the dark always come out a little weird. The flash also tends to change the color quality of the picture. The picture quality comes out nicely when it is not blurry though. The camera is very light compared to the ones I've used in the past. It is also very small and sleek so it'll fit in your pocket or tiny handbag for a night out. I chose the lime-green color and it looks really nice, I get a lot of compliments on the color since not too many cameras come in this color.

Reviews.Title: A very good photograf product
Reviews.Author: flordelalba
Reviews.Content: The SONY cyber shot camera I bought from you is very easy to handle, and for me it is light to carry it in my pursue, I really like it.  The only thing I am missing from others I used befores is that you can not use the zoom when you are taking movies.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful pictures
Reviews.Author: MASSIEL
Reviews.Content: The color of the camera is a nice pink, pictures are great and clear, well defined. Size is comfortable, price is good.  Is a great camera for someone who loves to take pictures all the time.  I recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Blurred Lines
Reviews.Author: CarlessInBoston
Reviews.Content: It's very pretty, but takes terrible quality photos.  Almost all photos are grainy, about half of them too blurry to keep.

Reviews.Title: Do yourself a favor. Don't buy this junk.
Reviews.Author: Mitch
Reviews.Content: Let me tell you my story.I took the camera out of the box, charged up the dead batter and proceeded to take 4 photos with the camera. Immediately went to my computer, hooked up the USB cable and tried to transfer said photos. But my computer would not recognize the camera, no big deal right? I downloaded the drivers and some crappy software Sony had specifically for the camera. Still nothing so I go ahead and try a different USB port and cable with no luck. Next step was I tried my other desktop with no luck, laptop with no luck. So I took the camera to work the next day and tried just about every freakin computer in the joint, downloading the drivers and software along this horrible journey. Okay, maybe my colleagues and I are missing something obvious here, so I contacted Sony eSupport and had a live chat with a "Technical Professional" which accumulated in nothing more then the guy sending me random links to the eSupport site for 20 minutes. So I emailed the Sony Support and got some copy and paste reply with no real useful information. By this point I was just about admit defeat and accept the camera and support was horrible, I tried 1 valiant more time and called tech support, after the 43 minute wait (I timed it with my phones stop watch) I got to talk to a real live person! I obliged the support lady and redid troubleshooting I had done a few times before and I was getting no where fast. As a last ditch effort she put me in touch with a website to repair the faulty camera, I filled in my information and described what has been going on. I then received a email from the repair service for Sony that stated I would get instructions via regular mail within a week. So 18 days later this package finally arrives and inside was a USB cable and letter explaining how a new USB cable and a factory reset (which I had done multiple times by this point) should solve my issues. I reset the camera and tried the new USB cable and surprise, surprise it didn't work. So I went back and reread the letter for instructions on how to send the camera back for "further repairs" and of course I was responsible for shipping costs, I expected this but I didn't expect the $85.00 they wanted for "potential repairs and parts".In short, I would avoid this camera and most Sony products like the plague. Camera worked okay, it was nothing special and the display sometimes showed blurry images for no apparent reason. My years old Kodak C433 is much sturdier but of course doesn't take as good of pictures but after this experience I wouldn't trade that Kodak relic for any Sony camera. Ever.

Reviews.Title: broken after less than a year
Reviews.Author: Eileen Kirkland
Reviews.Content: Initially I was pleased with this inexpensive-seeming camera, but it is already broken after less than a year of light use.  The lens doesn't retract and close completely but gets stuck and can't be turned off.  (My workaround is to remove and reinsert the battery.)  The view screen got scratched up almost immediately.  I also dislike paying for Sony's proprietary memory cards and batteries. (A spare battery costs half again the cost of the camera and is necessary because the battery warning is insufficient.)  The default is to have flash on, which means rather than a quick shot I always turn off the flash first.

Reviews.Title: Big disappointment
Reviews.Author: Kari
Reviews.Content: I usually love Sony Cyber Shots, they're my go-to camera. However, I bought this one for a vacation and was really disappointed in the quality of the camera itself and the pictures it takes. It's really nothing special! I would recommend buying a better version of the Cyber Shot because it will be well worth spending the extra money.

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Peter
Reviews.Content: recommend excellent article by 100 percent, and I've had these cameras and I have been very good, plus photographs that makes this camera has nothing to envy to any other camera, as it is the contrary, other cameras the envy of her, is a good buy, to take photographs at the time so nice and take a souvenir for the future. very good seller, I recommend, honest and reliable. see it is to buy it.

Reviews.Title: Love It!
Reviews.Author: Autumn'sMommy
Reviews.Content: Love this camera. Really clear pictures. Got here pretty fast. Good price. uprgrade from my last camera that I paid 139 for and this one has better picture quality.

Reviews.Title: Terrific product
Reviews.Author: Ms.rhetta
Reviews.Content: I LOVE my cybershot, out of the box ready to go.  Great pictures easy to use!!  The pictures are clear, the camera is very easy to use!!

Reviews.Title: Great Purchase
Reviews.Author: wanderer
Reviews.Content: The Sony Cyber-shot DSCW610 14.1 MP Digital Camera with 4x Optical Zoom and 2.7-Inch LCD (Silver) (2012 Model) is an excellent point and shoot camera, bargain.Superior battery life and fantastic 14.1 megapixel photos.  I've hadmore expensive cameras of this genre, but none any better.

Reviews.Title: !!!Awsome Product !!!!
Reviews.Author: Shane
Reviews.Content: This is an amazing camera, this must be the best camera i have ever bought , i strongly recommend it.

Reviews.Title: Nice Camera
Reviews.Author: James D. Hill
Reviews.Content: I use this camera for work.  It's perfect for what I need I also have four others like it. This came camera is a workhorse.

Reviews.Title: QUICK, SMALL, GOOD POINT & SHOOT
Reviews.Author: Shelley Cook
Reviews.Content: I' m giving this camera 5 stars, b/c it does well for older technology (CCD sensor compared to BSI-CMOS).My teenage daughter has had this camera for 9 months, and I have used it a few times when I wanted a better picture than my smartphone & before I bought a DSLR.I used only the iSCN mode which is Intelligent Scene Auto Mode. It detects the corrects scene.Flash produces proper colors & does well in low light.Expect digital noise, as you should expect that with any point & shoot with a small sensor & high megapixels. I don't think it will be noticeable if cropping is kept to a minimum & prints are kept small - 4x6 maybe up to 8x10. If you are a pixel peeper (like me) you SHOULD NOT use a point & shoot or smartphone. Go for a DSLR or possibly the newer compacts with large sensors or the mirrorless cameras do well.Autofocus is acceptable speed.My daughter has caught a few action shots of my younger sons shooting a basketball w/minimal blur.I have not tried video.This camera is very small & thin, which is nice to fit in a pocket if you don't want to carry any bulk.Even though this was bought for a teenager, I think this would be a good camera for everyday family shots.

Reviews.Title: I got my money worth Sony digital camera
Reviews.Author: Noah's Mom
Reviews.Content: This camera came package as issued. The camera is really slick and comes with a battery. It takes pictures really well and you can zoom in and also record videos. There are many other cameras to choose from, But I feel like I got my money worth with this Sony digital camera

Reviews.Title: Great camera!
Reviews.Author: average joe
Reviews.Content: Works great both for still pictures and video.  Compact size and easy to use.  We've had this for a year now and haven't had any issues with it.

Reviews.Title: Extraordinary pictures!
Reviews.Author: gben
Reviews.Content: This camera is fabulous, it so slim and cute. you can slip it in your pocket and take it anywhere. It takes great pictures at Night. I took a picture of NY city from the top of empire state building at night and I couldnt believe how it came out. Was so beautiful. I also happen to have a Nikon D5100 DSLR camera but I can't carry it every where. This one takes great pictures so it doesnt matter anymore!

Reviews.Title: Great for the price
Reviews.Author: Ruby Alvarado
Reviews.Content: Great for the price. Great battery life. Love the color. Super light and can fit in a back pocket. Quality of pics is good and works pretty well in low light.

Reviews.Title: roger venezuela 2013
Reviews.Author: roger
Reviews.Content: very good I recommend it all came as I was a bit slow charm thanks but I congratulate taste good sellers

Reviews.Title: Love this Camera
Reviews.Author: Kimberly Noonan
Reviews.Content: Great camera, easy to use and very slim in my hand.  I bought this as a camera to use for my new Granddaughter who is on her way!!! I would recommend this to someone who wants a easy and not complicated camera.  I also love the color!!

Reviews.Title: Not recommended
Reviews.Author: Elizabeth Mysona-Covert
Reviews.Content: I would like use this item every day to  take photo of nature and  family but  battery to low , zoom very short and colors of Picture poor.i should return !!!

Reviews.Title: the camera
Reviews.Author: gretchang
Reviews.Content: The camera is okay. the instructions that come with it are the barest minimum. you have to get what you need off the website. I wanted just a point and click camera to take quick shots, this has auto focus that takes about 3 seconds to work by then the photo i wanted is gone. it is very frustrating. so I do not use it as much as i wanted.

Reviews.Title: Love my Sony
Reviews.Author: M. Woods "Manners' Mom"
Reviews.Content: I had a Sony Cyber-shot many years ago that was dropped after a few years and the display stopped working.  I decided to switch over to a Nikon Coolpix because I love my Nikon SLR.  I NEVER liked the Coolpix nearly as much as my old Cyber-shot.  After a couple of years with the Coolpix trying to change settings with less than stellar picture results, I decided to go back to a Cyber-shot.  I am sooooo thankful I did.  I love the Sony point-and-shoot.  The camera is user friendly and the easy mode takes some of the best pictures I have ever seen.  I rarely take pictures I end up deleting because most of the settings are very accurate and the picture quality is top notch.  They only thing I would say that I do not like about Sony cameras are the memory sticks they come with.  They duo memory stick is not standard, so you will have to purchase an adapter in order to place the memory card directly into your pc.  I have a Macbook, so I use the usb cord to upload my pictures (which you can do as well with your PC).I will post some pictures when I have a chance to show the quality this camera puts out.  Plus, I LOVE the green color as it is very different from all of the usual camera colors.

Reviews.Title: Not bad
Reviews.Author: Charity K "TommysMommy"
Reviews.Content: I wouldn't advise giving this camera to a child, but otherwise it's not bad.  Our 8GB memory stick didn't work (too much memory?) so we had to go buy a 2GB one.  My son used this camera and loved it.  He shot movies, strapped it to the front of his R/C truck, took pictures at birthday parties, etc.  You know, the stuff 8 year old boys do.  The telescopic lens broke, so we have to replace it.  I'm glad we purchased an additional warranty.

Reviews.Title: Its Pink.
Reviews.Author: Jammsac
Reviews.Content: i got the pink one for a friend. it makes taking pictures very easy. my only word of caution is to be careful when taking out the battery since the battery door is very flimsy. once the door is close the camera is compact and durable.

Reviews.Title: good for carrying around to capture spontaneous moments
Reviews.Author: Oregon skier
Reviews.Content: This is a good general camera - I get better shots with my Canon - but it's very lightweight so it's great to keep in my purse.  I bought it to take on backpacking trips to save on weight but I will be taking my heavier camera instead.  This Sony doesn't take low light, action or macro pictures very well but it's great for normal lighting, full (not zoom) frame pictures.  The photos have good color even with the flash but it's not fast between photos and the continuous shot isn't too fast either.So, good all around general camera to carry around, would fit in a pocket, but not if you want to take creative photos or low light.

Reviews.Title: Thanks
Reviews.Author: Everlyne  Nandwa
Reviews.Content: The camera arrived in good shape, but the only surprise I noticed is that there wasn't any memory card in the camera. I might have missed to read that in the information but I ordered the item with an expectation of the memory card included.

Reviews.Title: Great product and great quality camera!
Reviews.Author: Jaleesa
Reviews.Content: I really liked the camera. Fast and quick delivery! Awesome features within the camera. The only thing would be the warrantyfor the camera. The best part that the battery life last for weeks.

Reviews.Title: Awesome!
Reviews.Author: marci b "marci b"
Reviews.Content: Camera replaced one that was lost - it works better than the old one!  It's very small, but provides crisp pix.

Reviews.Title: Daughter's Christmas present
Reviews.Author: ThirdDawn
Reviews.Content: No problems, a nice little camera.  She loves it and uses it all the time.  Great product for the money, I think.

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Joey Presto
Reviews.Content: Really good value, cheapest I've found online, anywhere in the world, with guarantee, and works perfectly.  Looks great in green, panoramic feature is superb!

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Johanna Ortega
Reviews.Content: Really good condition and works great!!  I would recommend for people to buy more of these products. Good quality and great price.

Reviews.Title: Pictures are kind of blurry by default...
Reviews.Author: Gregory Desrouleaux
Reviews.Content: Not sure why even under the best conditions, pictures come out just "okay".  Then again, its not the most expensive camera, so I guess I can't expect much.Panarama works great, though.

Reviews.Title: muy bueno
Reviews.Author: dj.henrry
Reviews.Content: la compra se realizo correctamente y el producto llego en buen estado hasta el lugar de destino. muchas gracias. ;)

Reviews.Title: OK camera if your expectations aren't too high
Reviews.Author: Mostly Harmless
Reviews.Content: This winter, while traveling in South America, I fell, landing on, and "fatally" damaging, my Canon PowerShot SD780 IS.  Not wanting to rely upon smartphone pictures for the remainder of the trip, I purchased another digital point and shoot - the Sony Cyber-shot DSCW610.  I purchased the 610, as options were very limited in that location; also, as I had been forewarned, electronics prices in that location were high - higher than the MSRP in the U.S. and about 50% higher than prices at Amazon, so the 610, near the bottom of the price range for digital point and shoots, made sense in the circumstances.Indeed, one of the strengths of the 610 is its low price point.  Another strength is that it truly is "pocketable" - it comfortably fits in a shirt or pants pocket; the worst digital picture is the one you can't take because you don't have your camera with you!As noted by others, the 610 has a plastic case (with only the appearance of brushed metal) and doesn't feel at all substantial.  (As my fall on the Canon 780 proved, however, even a metal case will not stand up to a strong enough force.)  The largest shortcoming of the 610 seems to be that the auto-focus works relatively slowly.  Also, my experience has been that the AF doesn't seem to work well consistently - many of my shots with the 610 do not seem to be "crisp".  (Reviewing the pictures I took with the Canon 780 prior to its destruction and the images captured with the Sony 610, I found that my "batting average" was definitely better with the Canon 780.  I acknowledge that there is a substantial difference in the price of the two cameras.)  While the controls on the 610, in general, are straight-forward and intuitive, the on / off switch and the shutter are both rectangles adjacent to one another on the top surface of the camera and sometimes, by feel only, I have to consider which is which (the shutter is slightly larger than the on / off and protrudes a very small amount from the camera top, whereas the on / off is very slightly recessed).As other reviewers have noted, the computer connector on the Cyber-shot 610 is not a standard size, so don't lose the provided cable!If price and size are important considerations, and if you are not too picky about your pictures, then the Sony Cyber-shot 610 may be a perfectly reasonable choice for you.  If you have higher expectations, then you should consider other cameras.

Reviews.Title: BUENA CAMARA
Reviews.Author: KAREN RODRIGUEZ
Reviews.Content: EXCELENTE CÁMARA .. BUENO TENIA QUE SER SONY, MUY BUENAS FUNCIONES EXCELENTE. ME ENCANTO EL COLOR QUE ELEGI . Y ME REENCANTA

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: Wayne
Reviews.Content: Perfect for my use. The right size and the pictures are o good I have framed many and have sold them and without a fancy expensive camera/

Reviews.Title: Great Sony Camera
Reviews.Author: Gloria
Reviews.Content: Loaded with features rivaling much larger cameras.  Slips easily in pocket or purse.  Has wrinkle removing feature.  Who doesn't want that?

Reviews.Title: Small and Light weight
Reviews.Author: 4strength
Reviews.Content: I read multiple reviews, did my research and tried to make an informed decision.  The pictures are of good quality.  Its perfect for a young adult, whom I purchased this for.  My only critique is that it seems very "cheap".. the case itself just seems very flimsy.

Reviews.Title: Can't Go Wrong with this camera
Reviews.Author: Erycah
Reviews.Content: I loved the camera. I got it at a great price and it functions well. It is a small camera but it takes wonderful and clear pictures.

Reviews.Title: i love
Reviews.Author: lilian
Reviews.Content: the camera is pretty super easy to use, takes excellent pictures and videos about the package arrived in perfect condition and on time, I recommend for your purchases with this seller.

Reviews.Title: Total satisfaction, works perfectly, everything ok, this product its ok, and it can be recommended for others users without doub
Reviews.Author: Xabier I. Amezaga
Reviews.Content: Total satisfaction, works perfectly, everything ok, this product its ok, and it can be recommended for others users without doubt

Reviews.Title: Great Gift
Reviews.Author: Samantha
Reviews.Content: I bought this for my sister since she is only still in high school I did not want to buy something expensive since it will jsut be thrown into her backpack or hockey bag!...When she opened it and I held it for the first time it was very light and felt a little cheap but so far has proved me wrong and works great!

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: johan saavedra
Reviews.Content: buen producto con llegada rápida de atención y tiempo, la especificación deseada sin problemas de contratiempo recomendado este vendedor ok

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-shot
Reviews.Author: James Kerry
Reviews.Content: Gave to grand daughter for Christmas. Very high quality photos and video.Grand daughter loves taking photos and videos.Easy to transfer to PC with photo memory or USB cableTakes either SD or Sony memory cards.SD cards are more versatile since many laptops have SD card readerPrice is worth it compared to children's toy cameras with much lower photo resolution.Can take photos or videos with indoor light levels.

Reviews.Title: good
Reviews.Author: ENRIQUE JOSE MORAO BENDEK
Reviews.Content: the only thin that i dont like is that you cant zoom when rec a video (4 more words required)

Reviews.Title: Great price - good camera
Reviews.Author: Jeni Gray-Roberts
Reviews.Content: We've had a lot of Sony's in our house starting out with the 2 megapixels about 10 years ago and upgrading every two years to more megapixels and smaller camera.  Our 6-yr-old wanted a camera so we gave her an old 3 megapixel one and she used it for a full year practicing her photography skills.  She never dropped it or lost it so now that she is nearly 8 she got this for Christmas.  We probably only use half of what it is capable of but it's fine for her and she just loves it.  She likes that its pink too so she can easily tell which is her camera.

Reviews.Title: Perfect
Reviews.Author: Jessicabm
Reviews.Content: Perfect little camera that does its job! Although I wish it was a little sturdier Iam happy with my purchase! It does its job and is reliable! & the price is GREAT! Def. something that is great for gifts that is actually useful & a camera that will be around for year to come if you take care of it! I recommend buying it with the case because the case doesnt come with it. & its small & made of plastic so you dont want to drop it! & don't forget to put the strap on it ( its included with the camera & found in the box )

Reviews.Title: excellent
Reviews.Author: Edisson
Reviews.Content: Recibi  la camara a tiempo, y es tal como esta descrito. Es muy bonita, tamano perfectoLas fotos son super claras

Reviews.Title: Bueno totalmente
Reviews.Author: Alejandra
Reviews.Content: Llego en perfecto estado, estoy muy contenta y agradecia con la compra, recomendable totalmente, pesonas cumplidas y correctas con lo que envian.

Reviews.Title: Nice little point-and-shoot camera
Reviews.Author: ZiaMule
Reviews.Content: I bought two of these for Christmas gifts and they did not disappoint the recipients. The choice of colors was great for teens, too.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cybershot Camera
Reviews.Author: leladrushing
Reviews.Content: I love my Sony Cybershot Camera. It is so easy to use and will recommend it to my friends.  Thx Lela

Reviews.Title: Good Pictures, Great Price
Reviews.Author: M. Castellano "Danegotiator"
Reviews.Content: I bought this as a Christmas present and they love it. Its very lightweight and portable. It takes very nice pictures and does the job for recording video. Definitely worth taking a look at if you just want a nice everyday camera. Pros will probably want to continue browsing around. My only complaint would be too light and feels like you never want to drop it.

Reviews.Title: excelente
Reviews.Author: elio
Reviews.Content: toda la transacción se realizo excelentemente recomiendo al vendedor el producto llego muy bien a mi destino sin ningún problema.

Reviews.Title: Great little camera
Reviews.Author: Jon Ramlow
Reviews.Content: Nice camera for the price. Takes great pix and my wife loves it. It does feel a little flimsy being made of plastic. Other than that i would still recommend this.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: smartshopper4life
Reviews.Content: Takes nice shots, is very light weight and easy to use, even for beginners and those who do not require a high tech gadget. Would recommend.

Reviews.Title: pictue
Reviews.Author: VE123958 MONICA AGUERO
Reviews.Content: picture hello fine fine the proces and buy il like a model for empled fine fine fine fine fine it likd

Reviews.Title: very happy with my purchase
Reviews.Author: giftor
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera as a gift for my girlfriend, and everything went as planned. The package arrived when it was supposed to (without a dint on it either.) Plus the panoramic feature on this camera is amazing!

Reviews.Title: I love my Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W610 14.1 MP Digital Camera
Reviews.Author: SSC
Reviews.Content: This camera is totally simple to use.  Each menu option is described in terms as well as icons.  Pictures are beautiful.  The auto feature allows great pictures with no hassle.  Love the options of panorama shots and movies!  I've had several other digital cameras that were difficult and did not produce beautiful pictures.  I love it!

Reviews.Title: Okay camera
Reviews.Author: JC
Reviews.Content: Okay camera for the price. We bought it for my 8 year old daughter and it works well for her and she loves the color. The quality is so-so and the controls are tiny and a little challenging to navigate.

Reviews.Title: Excelente producto
Reviews.Author: Yamilet
Reviews.Content: Excelente producto camara en buen estado, rápida entrega, muy contento con mi pedido se le recomienda 100% a futuros clientes desde venezuela

Reviews.Title: Love, love, love it!!!!!!!
Reviews.Author: LYNN E LE FEVERE
Reviews.Content: This was a gift for my son.  His favorite color is green so I was so happy to find one in green.

Reviews.Title: Tiny
Reviews.Author: Kate
Reviews.Content: It's a little smaller than I expected the camera itself as well as the screen. It's cute and can fit great in your purse. The quality of the pictures are alright they're not as professional looking as other camera's offer but great for the price.

Reviews.Title: thanks
Reviews.Author: Ilkin Nebizade
Reviews.Content: i want this item and i bought and i paid.this item arrived to me.and i love it.very very thank yu.

Reviews.Title: Great POS Camera
Reviews.Author: Merlin808
Reviews.Content: Camera arrived before estimated time of delivery and it was put to good use upon arrival.  I would highly recommend this camera to anyone needing an affordable POS camera.

Reviews.Title: Good value for money
Reviews.Author: P. Gupta
Reviews.Content: Very good price. Has Reasonable features. Battery life is also quite good. Easy to use. Looks somewhat cheap and of poor quality, though.

Reviews.Title: Nice
Reviews.Author: Edgar
Reviews.Content: i like i know.. sony i'ts a excelent trademarkwhen i buy my cyber-shot know what i'm buying..... outstanding ,Great

Reviews.Title: Sony Camera
Reviews.Author: Lisa M
Reviews.Content: I bought this camera for my 9 year old daughter for Christmas.  I love it and so does she.  I takes awesome pictures and is so easy to operate.Highly recommend!

Reviews.Title: Great camera
Reviews.Author: sarker
Reviews.Content: We had an older version of the cybershot and loved it so much we bought a Sony cybershot again. It did not disappoint.  It's very easy to use and looks stylish. We have the silver color. It's lightweight too. No complaints.

Reviews.Title: Beautiful Pictures
Reviews.Author: S. Adams-Sekaz
Reviews.Content: Bought this camera for my 13 year old daughter and she hasn't put it down yet. Pictures are crystal clear! The panoramic feature is awesome and such an added bonus. Camera is easy to use and very lightweight. Would highly recommend this product.

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Kathleen Jenkins
Reviews.Content: My son loved it. We were surprised how small it is and still had a zoom. Wish we had a chip for it too.

Reviews.Title: gift to my daughter
Reviews.Author: Anka Meyer
Reviews.Content: I gave this to my daughter and she loved it - function, color and size! I liked the low price

Reviews.Title: Really great price
Reviews.Author: New One
Reviews.Content: This is a quality camera, affordable,  takes great pictures. I use it everyday. Thinking of purchasing one for my mom.

Reviews.Title: SILVANA MARGARITA GARCIA CHACON
Reviews.Author: ve245253 Silvana Margarita García Chacón
Reviews.Content: Recibido sin problemas y satisfactoriamente por parte del titular.  Gracias por sus gestiones realizadas y por los tramites. Excelente Servicio.

Reviews.Title: It's everything I expect from a Sony product
Reviews.Author: KD Ashby
Reviews.Content: Excellent camera, and it does exactly what I need it to do.  Now I can take pictures of my woodworking projects

Reviews.Title: Loving this camera
Reviews.Author: J. Bradshaw
Reviews.Content: This cyber-shot has great picture quality and the multi-shot option to catch many actions pics one after another,which I love. The view screen is good size to see what you are focusing on and has many options to create the shot you are wanting.

Reviews.Title: easy to use
Reviews.Author: Carol Flansburg
Reviews.Content: I'm not very good with technology of any sort, but I love4 this camera.  It is small but takes very clear photos.  My old digital camera was VERY old and cost a lot more than this one, which is well worth the money I aid for it.  I would definitely recommend it to anyone.

Reviews.Title: Nice camera
Reviews.Author: PT
Reviews.Content: I was a little hesitant to buy this camera because I needed it for work and was concerned about the picture quality.  I was pleasantly surprised that this "little" camera takes great pictures.  Battery lasts for days even when taking 100+ pictures a day.  It fits nicely in any pocket and is just an overall well-built camera.  I would strongly recommend this camera to anyone looking for a reliable every day camera.Amazon is great too.  Delivery was very fast and item arrived in great condition.

Reviews.Title: Excelente compra
Reviews.Author: Rafael Guerrero
Reviews.Content: Es una cámara moderna y completa, fácil uso, buena resolución y zoom. Siento que hice una buena compra y que salí beneficiado de ella. Les recomiendo este producto para que lo regalen a cualquier miembro de tu familia.

Reviews.Title: I LOVE IT :)
Reviews.Author: Ariane "Arianna"
Reviews.Content: I really LOVE my Camera takes beautiful pictures, i am this kind of person who likes taking pictures a lot and this item right here it's THE BOMB, taking my bracess off soon also by the way, i will enjoy it even MORE!!!!!:) GOOD JOB SONY! i really recommend THIS

Reviews.Title: AWESOME!!!!
Reviews.Author: Scooby-Doo
Reviews.Content: I love this camera! Now mind that it is not super high tech but if you just want vacation/family/friends photos it is better then most ones for this price. You can wall charge it and it comes in like three colors. It does not come with a memory card or a case but it does come with a strap. They Download onto your computer SUPER easy and the photos look good. All in all, a good buy.

Reviews.Title: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W610 14.1 MP Digital Camera with 4x Optical Zoom...
Reviews.Author: ANGEL ARTURO ORTEGA LOPEZ
Reviews.Content: excelente camara, buenisima resolucion, la aplicacion de modo panoramico es grandiosa, es practica y ligera, facil de utilizar, la recomiendo!!!

Reviews.Title: Great Product.
Reviews.Author: Timothy Wagenknecht
Reviews.Content: it is a nice and good product that Worked as Expected. I would buy it again for a gift anytime.

Reviews.Title: nice purchase
Reviews.Author: andrew james
Reviews.Content: good zoom,  small enough to fix in a small in a small purse, as my wife wanted. she loves it.

Reviews.Title: Slick Camera
Reviews.Author: Andrew Buckley
Reviews.Content: My girlfriend wanted a camera for christmas so after a little browsing i came across this little number in green and what a knock out. Way better then my digi. She loves how clear the pictures come out and seeing how this is her first, she is very pleased with the color and quality. You make me look good Sony. Thank You!

Reviews.Title: ANOTHER OUTSTANDING BUY THROUGH AMAZON
Reviews.Author: Rommel
Reviews.Content: I have always liked Sony cameras. I did at one time try another brand a very well known one at that. Their battery life sucked. I had to have two or three extras on hand just in case. I went back to Sony. This camera was for my wife. I have a Sony as well bought right here. The camera's are outstanding but most important to me the battery life is amazing. You just cant go wrong with this 14.1 MP camera from sony. The pictures are great and the camera itself has some amazing features. Best of all are my continued Amazon experiences I have yet to have a bad buy and I have had many.

Reviews.Title: buena camara
Reviews.Author: carlos
Reviews.Content: es buena camara lo unico malo es el barrido panoramico q no es la cantidad de grado q describe el producto al comprar tenga en consideracion q no es lo descrito por el producto son mucho menos grados viene con todos sus accesorios lo recomiendo desde guarenas venezuela

Reviews.Title: Where is the flipping Memory Card???
Reviews.Author: Trixyinaz
Reviews.Content: Be sure to buy a memory card to go with this camera as it does NOT come with one.  How stupid is that?  Got this for a Christmas gift for my daughter who is dying to take pictures today and it's useless until we can get to the store tomorrow.  She is a very bummed out 8 year old on Christmas Day!  I've never purchased a camera that didn't come with one so I didn't even think to check that detail, but you would think it would be stated somewhere in the description that the memory card is NOT INCLUDED!  Come on Amazon, you need to do better with your product descriptions.  I would have purchased one when I ordered the camera, but now I have to go to my local store and get one - giving them the sale and not Amazon!  I'm sure once we get the memory card and can actually use, the camera will meet and exceed her expectations.  Just a little disappointing we can't use it today to take pictures!  Oh, and the camera box states it comes with a wrist band, but none was included.  Will have to write Sony about that.

Reviews.Title: Very small camera
Reviews.Author: HeyMom "Audrey"
Reviews.Content: This is a very small camera. It is so small and thin that it is hard to hold on to. My last camera had a charger that simply plugged the whole camera in to charge it (like my cell phone and my Kindle) - this camera you take the battery out of the camera and insert the battery into the charger then plug that into the wall. I am sure it is no big deal - just not what I expected - and I am sure I could have found out all this information on the description - but I didn't even think there was really a difference. I really LOVE the green color, though - it is so pretty. I wanted just a basic point and shoot camera to keep in my purse to take pictures of my family - but this one is so light and thin that it is hard to even hold it steady enough for a good picture. I think also the settings are more complicated than I would have liked - but then I am not very techy and I like things very simple.

Reviews.Title: Excelente camara!
Reviews.Author: Pablo Bauer
Reviews.Content: Compré esta camara hace un tiempo y soy digamoso usuario promedio con experiencia en varias camaras digitales automaticas.Esta camara es muy buena, calidad, buen precio, pequeña, con tomas panoramicas, excelente calidad de video, tiempo de duracion de la bateria muy bueno, que mas se puede pedir...La recomiendo ampliamente!

Reviews.Title: Great small camera!
Reviews.Author: Robert J. Brownsberger "rbrownsb"
Reviews.Content: We bought this camera for Christmas for one of our kids who "needed" a camera.  It is a great full feature small camera.  It is quite small, which is what we were looking for, and easy enough for our 7 year old to use.  It has some great features for more experienced users, but is a great camera for kids as well.  We got the green because it is his favorite color, and the color is pretty close to the picture.So, in short, it is small, simple, nice features for experienced users if/when needed, and for a good price. I recommend.

Reviews.Title: Opened it up on Christmas morning and the plastic piece where the battery and card is, broke off in my hand.  Very flimsy.
Reviews.Author: elizabeth hedden
Reviews.Content: Very disappointed, I had ordered a black one, and ended up getting this blue one. I have never been disappointed in Sony, I think it may have actually been used and repaired.

Reviews.Title: Not bad for the price
Reviews.Author: Harrelmt
Reviews.Content: It's a nice camera but my mistake when it says pink rose, it's not.  It's hot pink almost fushia.  The package says pink rose.  Very simple to operate.

Reviews.Title: Great Christmas Gift
Reviews.Author: Sonja L. Lutz "English Teacher"
Reviews.Content: I bought each of my grandchildren who were close to ten years old a digital camera.  I was very pleased with not only the camera, but with the colors that were available.  Although three of them haven't received them yet, the one granddaughter who had a birthday in October loved her camera.

Reviews.Title: Small but brilliant
Reviews.Author: Gilberto Rodriguez
Reviews.Content: I like so much it has many interesting features. I can say that in this summer I took the best pictures of my life

Reviews.Title: Question before I buy
Reviews.Author: The Reader "jnjm18"
Reviews.Content: I'm interested in purchasing this camera to replace an older SONY Cyber-shot model....the reviews on this say it does not come with a SD disk - so i'm wondering if the SD i have will fit in this newer model. The info on it read "SanDisk Ultra II MagicGatge Memory Stick Pro Duo 15 mb 4GB"(i loved my previous model and i couldnt post without a "rating" so as a result the 5 stars)

Reviews.Title: Camera
Reviews.Author: Larry Hernandez
Reviews.Content: I have to send to back to Sony as it won't upload pictures to my computer.  First time using camera!

Reviews.Title: Sony has always made a decent camera!
Reviews.Author: Smiley "Larry"
Reviews.Content: I really can't give you a proper opinion because this was a gift for Christmas so I gave it a 5 because I have used there cameras before and have had no issues.

Reviews.Title: better imposible i love it
Reviews.Author: daliesita
Reviews.Content: This camera is excelent product better imposible is cute and it has very good cuality i can espect any more

Reviews.Title: Did not like this item.
Reviews.Author: Ms. Browne
Reviews.Content: Not what I expected.  I would not recommend this product ot my friends.  This camera should be discountinued.  The price was great but the proudct sucks.

Reviews.Title: not good
Reviews.Author: cyanglady
Reviews.Content: it was nice once I opened the package till I started using the camera.I gave this rate becuz it didnt meet my expectations.I would not recommend it to anyone... becuz it was having problems closing when pressing the on/off click.

Reviews.Title: I need product invoicing
Reviews.Author: miami
Reviews.Content: Goodnight need you please send me the bill for the purchase of the camera because it is necessary for it to be transferred by Liberty Express to Venezuela is that it came to miami but I fail the product bill is urgent that I send this information to send it because the product is retained for lack of a legal document attesting to the purchase.

ProductInfo.Features:
14.1 megapixels
4X Optical Zoom
2.7 inch LCD
Take stunning images in Sweep Panorama mode-up to 360°
iSCN detects 8 scene conditions and adjusts camera settings
ProductInfo.Name: Sony Cyber-shot DSC-W610 14.1 MP Digital Camera with 4x Optical Zoom and 2.7-Inch LCD (Pink) (2012 Model)
